name: Minh Vu

responsibilities: Leveraged OpenAI API to engineer a job classification system delivering tailored recommendations, boosting job relevance by 50%

Led an AngularJS-TypeScript website for managing prescription, serving Japan's Pharmacists Association with 500-100 daily visits
Refined the company's JavaScript SDK, enabling functionality and seamless integration for over 350+ UIs and modals
Designed Observer pattern to implement two-way data binding, synchronizing 20,000 data entries between UI and data store
Managed tasks and schedules in fast-paced environment, improving communication and collaboration using Agile-Scrum method
Deployed Microsoft's GraphRAG data retrieval into sociological documentation, achieving 30% improvement in F1 score
Enhanced employee property search using Solr for text and SBERT for semantic search, boosting mean average precision by 25%

personal_projects.title: CloudCueAI

personal_projects.title: Beatcode
description: Utilized Python and FastAPI to design a scalable multi-client LeetCode game platform, achieving 500+ players during beta

personal_projects.title: OhEss

personal_projects.title: Sculpt AI
description: Pioneered 3D solution for Metaverse platforms, using AI-based image cropping and Blender modeling, cutting manual effort by 30%
